de.mrapp.android.adapter.expandablelist.filterable

Interface ExpandableListFilterListener<GroupType,ChildType>

  • Type Parameters:
    GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the observed adapter's group items
    ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the observed adapter's child items

    public interface ExpandableListFilterListener<GroupType,ChildType>
    Defines the interface, all listeners, which should be notified when the underlying data of an ExpandableListAdapter has been filtered, must implement.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onApplyChildFilter(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, java.lang.String query, int flags, Filter<ChildType> filter, GroupType group, int groupIndex, java.util.List<ChildType> filteredChildren, java.util.List<ChildType> unfilteredChildren)
      The method, which is invoked, when the child items of a specific group have been filtered by using a query.
      void onApplyGroupFilter(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, java.lang.String query, int flags, Filter<GroupType> filter, java.util.List<GroupType> filteredGroups, java.util.List<GroupType> unfilteredGroups)
      The method, which is invoked, when the adapter's group items have been filtered by using a query.
      void onResetChildFilter(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, java.lang.String query, int flags, GroupType group, int groupIndex, java.util.List<ChildType> unfilteredChildren)
      The method, which is invoked, when a filter, which has been used to filter the child items of a specific group, has been reseted.
      void onResetGroupFilter(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, java.lang.String query, int flags, java.util.List<GroupType> unfilteredGroups)
      The method, which is invoked, when a filter, which has been used to filter the adapter's group items, has been reseted.

    • Method Detail

      • onApplyGroupFilter

        void onApplyGroupFilter(@NonNull
                        ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String query,
                        int flags,
                        @Nullable
                        Filter<GroupType> filter,
                        @NonNull
                        java.util.List<GroupType> filteredGroups,
                        @NonNull
                        java.util.List<GroupType> unfilteredGroups)
        The method, which is invoked, when the adapter's group items have been filtered by using a query.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        query - The query, which has been used, as a String. The query may not be null
        flags - The flags, which have been used, as an Integer value, or 0, if no flags have been used instead
        filter - The filter, which has been used to apply the query on the single group items, as an instance of the type Filter or null, if the group items' implementations of the interface Filterable have been used instead
        filteredGroups - A collection, which contains the group items, which have been filtered, as an instance of the type List or an empty collection, if no group items have been filtered
        unfilteredGroups - A collection, which contains the adapter's unfiltered group items, as an instance of the type List or an empty collection, if the adapter does not contain any group items

      • onResetGroupFilter

        void onResetGroupFilter(@NonNull
                        ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String query,
                        int flags,
                        @NonNull
                        java.util.List<GroupType> unfilteredGroups)
        The method, which is invoked, when a filter, which has been used to filter the adapter's group items, has been reseted.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        query - The query used by the filter, which has been reseted, as a String. The query may not be null
        flags - The flags used by the filter, which has been reseted, as an Integer value or 0, if no flags have been used by the filter
        unfilteredGroups - A collection, which contains the adapter's unfiltered group items, as an instance of the type List or an empty collection, if the adapter does not contain any group items

      • onApplyChildFilter

        void onApplyChildFilter(@NonNull
                        ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String query,
                        int flags,
                        @Nullable
                        Filter<ChildType> filter,
                        @NonNull
                        GroupType group,
                        int groupIndex,
                        @NonNull
                        java.util.List<ChildType> filteredChildren,
                        @NonNull
                        java.util.List<ChildType> unfilteredChildren)
        The method, which is invoked, when the child items of a specific group have been filtered by using a query.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        query - The query, which has been used, as a String. The query may not be null
        flags - The flags, which have been used, as an Integer value, or 0, if no flags have been used instead
        filter - The filter, which has been used to apply the query on the single child items, as an instance of the type Filter or null, if the child items' implementations of the interface Filterable have been used instead
        group - The group, whose child items have been filtered, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group may not be null
        groupIndex - The index of the group, whose child items have been filtered, as an Integer value
        filteredChildren - A collection, which contains the child items, which have been filtered, as an instance of the type List or an empty collection, if no child items have been filtered
        unfilteredChildren - A collection, which contains the group's unfiltered child items, as an instance of the type List or an empty collection, if the group does not contain any child items

      • onResetChildFilter

        void onResetChildFilter(@NonNull
                        ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String query,
                        int flags,
                        @NonNull
                        GroupType group,
                        int groupIndex,
                        @NonNull
                        java.util.List<ChildType> unfilteredChildren)
        The method, which is invoked, when a filter, which has been used to filter the child items of a specific group, has been reseted.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        query - The query used by the filter, which has been reseted, as a String. The query may not be null
        flags - The flags used by the filter, which has been reseted, as an Integer value or 0, if no flags have been used
        group - The group, whose child items have been filtered, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group may not be null
        groupIndex - The index of the group, whose child items have been filtered, as an Integer value
        unfilteredChildren - A collection, which contains the group's unfiltered child items, as an instance of the type List or an empty collection, if the group does not contain any child items
